subject: Debt Management Office Niger
body:
Debt Management Office Nigeria
DEBT MANAGEMENT OFFICE NIGERIA
Dear Sir.
Be inform i was  ask to release your payment in the next 48 hrs
Amount $17.5 Million U.S  Dollars To this regards we strictly advice
you to forward all  needed  information your account and your ID.On
Behalf of the entire staff Debt Management Office Nigeria the Debt
Management Office remains confident in the nation’s debt servicing
Financial  system is been achieved.
“Our Federal Government is mindful all contractors must be paid in the
next 48 hrs.
Management Team - Debt Management Office Nigeria
Mr. Miji Amidu

subject: Re:   Debt Management Office Niger
body:
Dear Mr. Miji Idu,

Thank you for your email. However, I believe there may be a misunderstanding as I am not expecting any payment from the Debt Management Office Nigeria. Could you please provide more details about this matter?

Best wishes,
Mary
